p: Early blight is one of the most important diseases which are caused by the fungus Alternaria solani. Jones and Grout, that occurs in most potato growing regions worldwide [ 5]. The most common and effective method for the control of early blight is through the application of foliar fungicides, but the fungicides treatment is not protected as chemicals pollute environment, effect health vulnerability in humans and when these harmful chemicals enter into the food chain become hazardous to all living entities.
